title: Business and Investment Climate in Timor-Leste

questions.answer: Obtain approval from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

choices: Enhance digital infrastructure for e-government services
Develop targeted marketing campaigns for Indonesian investors
Strengthen capacity of investment promotion agencies

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Timor-Leste (CCI-TL)?
choices: To support and represent the private sector
questions.answer: To support and represent the private sector

questions.question: Which of the following is mentioned as a strength or opportunity for Timor-Leste's business climate?

choices: To help businesses improve performance and competitiveness
questions.answer: To help businesses improve performance and competitiveness

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a potential improvement for Timor-Leste's business climate?

choices: Signing of agreements on investment promotion and protection
Creation of a joint stock exchange
questions.answer: Signing of agreements on investment promotion and protection
